configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.details: Manage school profile, academic years, departments, grading scales, and classroom settings.

membership.title: Membership
membership.details: Manage user accounts, assign roles, handle permissions, and bulk import/export users.

system.title: System
system.details: Monitor system health, view audit logs, manage backups, and control cache settings.

integration.title: Integration
integration.details: Configure OAuth providers, email services, payment gateways, and webhook endpoints.

security.title: Security
security.details: Monitor security events, manage sessions, configure 2FA, and set security policies.

reports.title: Reports & Analytics
reports.details: Generate usage reports, view analytics, track performance metrics, and export data.

communication.title: Communication
communication.details: Create announcements, manage email templates, configure notifications, and broadcast messages.

subscription.title: Subscription & Billing
subscription.details: Manage subscription tiers, configure billing, handle discounts, and view revenue analytics.

workflow.title: Admin Workflow Guide
workflow.description: Step-by-step guide to managing your school platform

1.title: Configure School Settings
1.description: Set up school profile, academic years, departments, and classroom configurations.

2.title: Manage User Accounts
2.description: Create user accounts, assign roles, and set permissions for teachers, students, and staff.

3.title: Set Up Integrations
3.description: Configure OAuth providers, email services, and payment gateways for seamless operations.

4.title: Configure Security Policies
4.description: Set up 2FA, session policies, and monitor security events to protect your platform.

5.title: Monitor System Health
5.description: Track system performance, review audit logs, and ensure smooth platform operations.

6.title: Generate Reports & Analytics
6.description: Create comprehensive reports, analyze usage patterns, and make data-driven decisions.
